div.style: margin: 50px 0px 33px calc((100% - 980px) * 0.5); padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: 0px 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; text-align: start; position: relative; left: -40px; grid-area: 1 / 1 / 2 / 2; place-self: start; pointer-events: none; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10px; width: 1049px;

h2.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: 0px 0px; font: bold 84px/1em "playfair display", serif; color: rgb(28, 28, 28); pointer-events: auto; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: center;

background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 62px; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;

div.p: Let your home take care of you. Before you even open your front door, your home will be ready to welcome you. With countless customizable scenes and sequences, you can return home from work to find your garage lights on, your favorite song being played, and your curtains already closed.

p.style: margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: 0px 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 18px; line-height: normal; font-family: georgia, palatino, "book antiqua", "palatino linotype", serif; color: rgb(28, 28, 28); pointer-events: auto;

span.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: 0px 0px;
margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: 0px 0px;

span.span: Turn your house into a home.

span.span: At HDL we provide customizable automation solutions which enable the comfort, convenience, and security of living spaces to be dramatically increased.

span.span: Our product range can automatically manage the many electrical devices within your home, so that you donâ€™t have to.

span.span: This seamless control of household devices and appliances also delivers significant energy savings. On average a fully automated home can reduce its energy expenditure by at least 30%.

span.span: With HDL, your house is more than a home, itâ€™s an investment in the future.

div.p: Take charge of your home from anywhere in the world. On vacation and canâ€™t remember if you turned the television off? With HDL just use your iOS or Android device to control in real-time every automated element within your home. Able to be managed through mobile devices, dedicated wall panels, or voice commands, HDL puts you in control.

div.p: Your home. Your rules. Every home is as individual as its owner. Thatâ€™s why thereâ€™s no such thing as a standard smart home, and why every HDL installation is custom designed to meet your exact requirements. From system functionality, to switch color and icons, HDL lets you create your ideal smart home solution.

div.p: Protect whatâ€™s precious to you. A home needs to be a place of safety and refuge. With HDLâ€™s range of smart home solutions, a powerful and secure detection network can be created to safeguard your property. Compatible with leading 3rd party security products, HDL can turn your home into a castle.
